modName: Archmage to barkeeper dark brotherhood style
summary: Archmage to black and red barkeeper
descriptionHtml:
hey everyone, 
I didnt like the Archmage robe like many of us. 
So I was using Nocturnal for a while. I especially liked the texture versions of Thelthalion http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2429
but those damn funky sleeves kept bugging me.
So I decided to use my favorite dress so far in the game wich is the barkeeper robe. 
So I made Archmage become barkeep, but I also retextured barkeep to be dark brotherhood themed some.

Note: This is my first mod for this game, I did this very quickly without using my pen tablet so it\'s not perfect nor does it have any specular.

I dont have much time either so I didnt change the bottom of the dress wich is the only part of the barkeep I dont like. I tried making the alpha to see the legs but it didnt work and I dont have the time to change it. If any of you guys feel like making the skirt part shorter or similar to the nocturnal feel free to do so and let me know, certainly would make me happy.

edit: You need the hoodless version of the archmage robe for this, if you use the hooded version it\'s still gonna have the hood
author: kimitsukouseki

files.name: Archmage to barkeep dark brotherhood style
